mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rnum, n.*, u.name FROM notice n JOIN regular_user u ON n.writer = u.idx
ORDER BY n.notice_idx ) p
mapper.update: update notice set readcount = readcount + 1 where notice_idx = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(writer, title, content, notice_file, notice_original, register_date, readcount) values (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{notice_file}, #{notice_original}, current_timestamp, 0)
